title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Team Motivation Assessment and Collaboration Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can classify motivational conflicts arising within instructional design teams into three types.
Learners can evaluate how team members’ value judgments influence project decisions through case analysis.
Learners can propose at least two consensus-building strategies in motivational conflict situations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
